code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic x3,
    input logic x2,
    input logic x1,
    output logic f
);

always @(*) begin
    f = (x2 & ~x3) | (x1 & x3);
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
